definitions.definition: the action or instance of soliciting ; petition ; proposal
an inchoate offense that consists of a person offering money or inducing another to commit a crime with the specific intent that the person solicited commit the crime

main_definition: the action or instance of soliciting ; petition ; proposal
secondary_definitions: ( US , law ) an inchoate offense that consists of a person offering money or inducing another to commit a crime with the specific intent that the person solicited commit the crime
